rent_description: We support property search and lease agreements for rental properties.
rent_paragraph: We provide rental brokerage services that meet the diverse needs of both individuals and corporations.
Our listings cover a wide range of properties, including luxury rentals in central Tokyo, family homes, studio apartments, and shared housing.
Our experienced staff offer full support with rent negotiations, tenant screening, and contract arrangements, ensuring a secure and smooth leasing process.
We offer multilingual support in English and Chinese for expatriates and short-term residents.
For corporate clients, we provide B2B solutions such as company housing management and bulk arrangements for multiple properties.
We work closely with property managers and provide thorough explanations of key terms to avoid any post-contract issues.
We help clients find properties that suit their lifestyle and values, with sincerity and flexibility.
